title: aram isnt ranked....
body:
so i had a game where i noticed my team was taking alot of damaged pushed into the enemy tower from the start pressed tab see that its a 5v4 
and was like  hey its a 5v4 dont let them get free kills on you as i hit enter our zil dies i thought it was funny but then out cho starts flaming me about how its not ranked and i was like ok but we can still play right no need to feed under there tower? and cho and zil procceded to taunt me and afk  all chating about how ima troll and they took my lolipops and then the enemy teams wukong started taunting me to....... then our teams jax afked after like 4 min of us fighting a 3v4 so not full his fault but yet the cho was taunt me telling me to afk and i was like no.....so we won after jax stoped afking he was afk for at least 6 min. end game screen cho and zil and the enemy team wukong were trolling the shit out of me talking about candy and lolipops and how i should get ban for troling them????? so i reported all 3 of them for verb and jax just for afk and even left a note saying its not fully his fault
i have never gotten an email from riot saying i was in the wrong so im just wondering do you popel think they needed to be reported or its my fault for pointing out its a 5v4 not to tower dive them lvl 3 sorry for the shity english dont be a dick i didnt go to school

ARAM players are a lot of trash, most of them are insecure about how bad they are and completely lose it if anyone even suggests they do anything but what they are currently doing.

You cant beat trash, best thing to do is just hope for a better team.

Riot never gives confirmation of punishment (or inaccuracy of report), which is an odd choice, since it leads to people being unsure about what is actually allowed or not.

I once had a Rakan who afked because we wouldn't surrender. In ARAM.
The game was practically already over so I told him there was no point in surrendering. ARAM games normally barely last 15 minutes anyway so there's really no point. After he afked every time I told him to get back into the game, he spammed 'but its aram' in all caps.
'Its ARAM' isn't an excuse you troll, feed, afk, or otherwise throw the game for your team. If you're not going to play/try to win, then don't play at all. I've been against obviously trolling 5 man premades in norms who try harder than most people who play ARAM.
